actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend the emergency unemployment compensation program until September 30, 1977, to revise the trigger provisions in such program.

summary.text: Special Unemployment Assistance Extension Act - Extends the special unemployment assistance program under the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act for one year. Directs the Secretary of Labor to enter into agreements with States to provide for the payment of additional benefits in accordance with the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the emergency unemployment compensation program until September 30, 1977, to revise the trigger provisions in such program.
